guiToApplication

Class FormWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.Form
      • guiToApplication.FormWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsciiTypable, Clickable, FunctionTypable, Typable, CanvasContent

    public class FormWrapper
extends Form
implements CanvasContent
    A bridge to let a form be displayed in a canvas window
